text: The 2018 Montreux Volley Masters is the 33rd edition of the women's volleyball competition set in Montreux, Switzerland. ==Participating teams== {| class="wikitable" style="width:50%;" |- !width=25%|Pool A !width=25%|Pool B |- | | |} ==Squads== ==Group stage== The first 2 teams of each group qualify for the final round. *All times are Central European Summer Time (UTC+02:00). ===Group A=== {| class="infobox bordered" |- | style="width:15px; background:#cfc;"| ||Qualified for the semifinals |} |} |} ===Group B=== {| class="infobox bordered" |- | style="width:15px; background:#cfc;"| ||Qualified for the semifinals |} |} |} ==Classification round== |} ==Final round== === Semifinal === |} ===3rd place=== |} ===Final=== |} ==Final standings== {| class="wikitable" style="text-align: center;" |- !width=40|Rank !width=180|Team |- | |style="text-align:left;"| |- | |style="text- align:left;"| |- | |style="text-align:left;"| |- |4 |style="text-align:left;"| |- |5 |style="text-align:left;"| |- |6 |style="text-align:left;"| |- |7 |style="text-align:left;"| |- |8 |style="text-align:left;"| |} ==Awards== *Most Valuable Player : Paola Egonu *MVP's of Teams : Gabriela Guimarães : Lin Li : Fotso Mogoung : Lucia Bosetti : Agnieszka Kąkolewska : Nataliya Goncharova : Thays Deprati : Cansu Özbay ==References== 2018 Montreux Volley Masters Montreux Volley Masters Montreux Volley Masters
title: 2018 Montreux Volley Masters
